Author: Josh Roman
Name: Mac Memory Monitor
Description: Monitor macOS RAM, swap, and memory pressure with live color-coded progress rings. Track memory used, app memory, wired, compressed, cached, and swap usage in real-time on your Stream Deck.

Actions.Name: Swap Usage Monitor
Actions.Tooltip: Monitor macOS swap memory usage with color-coded alerts (green/yellow/red)

Actions.Name: RAM Usage Monitor
Actions.Tooltip: Monitor total RAM memory usage on macOS with live progress ring

Actions.Name: App Memory Monitor
Actions.Tooltip: Monitor memory consumed by running applications on macOS

Actions.Name: Wired Memory Monitor
Actions.Tooltip: Monitor wired (locked) memory that cannot be paged to disk

Actions.Name: Compressed Memory
Actions.Tooltip: Monitor macOS compressed memory to optimize RAM usage

Actions.Name: Cached Files Monitor
Actions.Tooltip: Monitor macOS file cache memory usage

Actions.Name: Physical RAM Display
Actions.Tooltip: Display total installed physical RAM on your Mac

Actions.Name: Custom Memory Metric
Actions.Tooltip: Configure which memory metric to display on this button
